channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- One Hand Operation +
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- One Hand Operation +

item.title: CVE-2023-21450|2024-08-02T09:36:34.577Z -- samsung%20mobile -- one%20hand%20operation%20%2B
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in One Hand Operation + prior to version 6.1.21 allows multi-users to access owner's widget without authorization via gesture setting.
